mapper.select: select cp.product_id, cp.quantity, p.display_avt, p.name as product_name, p.price, p.num_available from cart c join cart_product cp on c.id = cp.cart_id join products p on p.id = cp.product_id where c.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into cart_product(cart_id, product_id, quantity) values (#{cartProduct.cartId}, #{cartProduct.productId}, #{cartProduct.quantity})
mapper.delete: delete from cart_product where cart_id = #{cartId} and product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT 1 FROM cart_product WHERE cart_id = #{cartId} AND product_id = #{productId} LIMIT 1
